text: Paraivongius varicolor is a species of leaf beetle from Nigeria and the Democratic Republic of the Congo, described by Édouard Lefèvre in 1891. ==References== Category:Eumolpinae Category:Beetles of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Beetles described in 1891 Category:Insects of West Africa Category:Taxa named by Édouard Lefèvre
title: Paraivongius varicolor
